name: flame-burst
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
short_effect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
